refsect2.title: eog_exif_util_format_date ()
refsect2.para: Takes a date string formatted after Exif specifications and generates a more readable, possibly localized, string out of it.

listitem.simpara: a date string following Exif specifications
a newly allocated date string formatted according to the current locale.

refsect2.title: eog_exif_util_get_value ()
refsect2.para: Convenience function to extract a string representation of an Exif tag directly from an ExifData struct. The string is written into buffer as far as buf_size permits.

listitem.simpara: the requested tag's id. See exif-tag.h from the libexif package for possible values (e.g. EXIF_TAG_EXPOSURE_MODE).
